00020 
00021 #ifndef BOOLCONVERTIBLE_H_
00022 #define BOOLCONVERTIBLE_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 
00026 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00027 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00028 
00032 class BoolConvertible_base : public virtual Object {
00033 protected:
00034     typedef void (BoolConvertible_base::*bool_type)() const;
00035 
00036     void this_type_does_not_support_comparisons() const {
00037     }
00038 
00039     BoolConvertible_base() {
00040     }
00041 
00042     BoolConvertible_base(const BoolConvertible_base&) {
00043     }
00044 
00045     BoolConvertible_base & operator=(const BoolConvertible_base&) {
00046         return *this;
00047     }
00048 
00049     ~BoolConvertible_base() {
00050     }
00051 };
00052 
00060 template <typename T = void>
00061 class BoolConvertible : public BoolConvertible_base {
00062 public:
00063 
00064     operator bool_type() const {
00065         return (static_cast<const T*> (this))->toBool()
00066                 ? &BoolConvertible::this_type_does_not_support_comparisons
00067                 : 0;
00068     }
00069 protected:
00070 
00071     ~BoolConvertible() {
00072     }
00073 };
00074 
00075 template<>
00076 class BoolConvertible<void> : public BoolConvertible_base {
00077 public:
00078 
00079     operator bool_type() const {
00080         return toBool() == true ?
00081                 &BoolConvertible::this_type_does_not_support_comparisons : 0;
00082     }
00083 protected:
00084     virtual bool toBool() const = 0;
00085 
00086     virtual ~BoolConvertible() {
00087     }
00088 };
00089 
00094 template <typename T, typename U>
00095 void operator==(const BoolConvertible<T>& lhs, const BoolConvertible<U>& rhs) {
00096     lhs.this_type_does_not_support_comparisons();
00097     return false;
00098 }
00099 
00104 template <typename T, typename U>
00105 void operator!=(const BoolConvertible<T>& lhs, const BoolConvertible<U>& rhs) {
00106     lhs.this_type_does_not_support_comparisons();
00107     return false;
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 
00112 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00113 
00114 #endif  /* BOOLCONVERTIBLE_H_ */
